summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented. REQ-1 is addressed in GamePlayPage.tsx with a fullscreen toggle button using Maximize/Minimize icons, the Fullscreen API (document.documentElement.requestFullscreen), and fullscreenchange event listeners. REQ-2 is addressed in App.tsx by conditionally hiding Header and Footer when isFullscreen is true via FullscreenContext. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.
